1.title: El Encuentro
1.plot: The girls meet, Victoria and Isabella move in to the house where Sara and Julieta are awaiting them. The girls get acquainted with each other and to celebrate they go out.

2.title: Mirar y Ser Mirado
2.plot: While Sara is taking her yoga practice to another level, Vicky meets Joaquin, a cousin of Sara's who lives in the country and has come to town for business.

3.title: Sexo Casual
3.plot: It's party time at the house, and Vicky, Julieta, and Sara are enjoying the evening. Isabella prepares dinner for her girlfriends but then receives a tempting offer and decides to go for it.

4.title: Swapping
4.plot: Sara receives an invitation from her yoga instructor to a swingers' ball, and to back her up, Isabella decides to tag along. It's going to be a night full of discoveries and surprises.

5.title: The Initiation
5.plot: The Roommates' world is thoroughly shaken up by Julieta's decision to explore virgin territory and act out her unexplored fantasies. Excited by this, each woman decides to explore her own, seeking just the right companion to make it happen.

6.title: Pleasure Journey
6.plot: Isabella and her lover from the market are locked in a passionate encounter, while Sara enjoys looking on. Vicky rejects Joaquin's romantic intentions.

7.title: Noche de Ronda
7.plot: The girls just want to have fun, and Celeste's birthday is a perfect excuse to explore the local nightlife. Julieta and Cristian slip away from the group and do it in the car in the middle of the parking lot.

8.title: She's got a Girlfriend
8.plot: The four girls show up for a photo session with a very important Chilean fashion designer. It's their first job together. During the gig, Sara hooks up again with her make-up and wardrobe specialist, while Victoria seduces the photographer.

9.title: Lust
9.plot: Benjamin, Sara's lover who lives in Paris, comes back to Chile and invites her to a high-class casino with all of her playmates. He is one of her sexual gurus, and he cannot wait to surprise her.

10.title: Farewell
10.plot: It's time to say goodbye to Isabella and the girls are going to do it as only they know how: by letting everything go and having a blast, giving free reign to their wanton desire.

imdb.plot outline: Victoria, Isabella, Sara, and Julieta are four friends, young, beautiful, free and totally uninhibited. Among other things, they share a taste for partying, dancing and sex. Their work as models brings them together, and so does their desire for a good time. After Vicky arrives from Argentina, the four girls agree that there will be only one rule during their time together: absolutely anything goes. Over the course of ten episodes, we'll accompany them as they delight in sex without limits or prejudice. We'll witness casual as well as virtual encounters, in pairs, threesomes and all alone. These women are always willing to explore new possibilities, finding their pleasure in bars, discos, indoors, outdoors or in the car, because anywhere at all is the right place for sex and a wild good time. Welcome to the world of Roommates.
imdb.title: Roommates
plot: Victoria, Isabella, Sara, and Julieta share a house with no rules at all. These models have a taste for partying, dancing and sex. They're out to have a good time, and for them, sex is the very best time of all.::HBO Latin America
